name: Impeccable Blurring Second-Skin Matte Foundation
about: What it is:A medium to full coverage velvet-matte foundation with a non-comedogenic formula that perfects skin with a blurring, second-skin finish up to 12 hours..Finish:Matte.Formulation:Liquid.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Provides moisture and a plumping effect..What Else You Need to Know:A medium to full-coverage, long-wearing water-based formula that blurs pores, fine lines, and wrinkles for up to 12 hours. Powered by Precision Blur Technology, this hydrating velvet-matte foundation features Hyaluronic Acid for a smooth, flawless finish and second-skin feel..Clinical Results:In an independent study of 100 women:
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Provides moisture and a plumping effect. .-Bixa Orellana: Blurs pores and imperfections. .-Phytoglycogen: Delivers youthful, radiant skin...Water/Aqua/Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Butylene Glycol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract, Sodium Chloride, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Triethoxycaprylsilane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Phytate, Glycogen, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Maltodextrin, May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Prep skin with water-based formulas. .- For dry skin, pair with a hydrating primer. For oily skin, pair with a mattifying primer. .- Using 1-2 pumps, start by applying in the center of the face and blend outwards. Pair with a brush for full coverage or a beauty sponge for lighter coverage. Focus on desired areas to build coverage as needed. .- To brighten and conceal, pair with Magic Touch Concealer (sold separately). .- Set complexion with Impeccable Setting Spray (sold separately) to set, blur, and mattify with 24HR wear. ..Pro tips:.- Pair with non-oil-based formulas for optimal results..- For dry skin types, prep skin with hydration prior to application..- To build coverage, use pressing motions in desired area..- The velvet-matte finish can be set to your preference..-Pair with Loose Setting Powder (sold separately) for an extra, locked-in complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade blends so effortlessly into your skin and looks natural. It has no smell and itu2019s soft to the touch and the absorbency is quick.
I love this foundation. It comes in a cute designed box. The foundation has amazing coverage and hid my pimple perfectly. Itu2019s just the perfect texture. I also love that it was not super scented.
